sentences.en: At church people kneel when they pray.
sentences.cn: 人们在教堂祈祷时要下跪.

sentences.en: Dad would kneel to receive her kisses while he scratched her ears.
sentences.cn: 我爸便跪下去,搔弄着她的耳朵,同时接受她的亲吻.

sentences.en: Do not run, stand, kneel or spin in the slide.
sentences.cn: 滑道内禁止跑动 、 站立 、 跪下或旋转.

sentences.en: I kneel only to god, he is not here.
sentences.cn: 我只向上帝下跪, 他可不在这儿.

sentences.en: In church you have to kneel during parts of the service.
sentences.cn: 在教堂,你应该跪下在仪式期间.

sentences.en: In Heaven's name why should you kneel to me?'
sentences.cn: 天啦!你为什么要向我跪下? ”

sentences.en: Kneel down and pray, here comes your judgment day.
sentences.cn: 下跪祈祷, 在这里你的判断来天.

sentences.en: Once the emperor got angry, all the officials would kneel down.
sentences.cn: 皇帝一发怒, 文武百官都跪了下来.

sentences.en: Shepherds and wise man will kneel and adore him.
sentences.cn: 牧羊人和智者将屈膝且膜拜他.

sentences.en: The altar, as in prehistory, is anywhere you kneel.
sentences.cn: 如同在史前, 你膜拜的地方就是祭堂.

sentences.en: The subjects had to kneel down before the king.
sentences.cn: 在国王的面前臣民必须跪下.

sentences.en: The workers kneel on the ground and hammer the small stones in.
sentences.cn: 工人们跪在地上，将小石子锤进去。

sentences.en: Then the two fighters kneel and pray to God.
sentences.cn: 然后两个斗士跪下,向上帝祈祷.

sentences.en: There are hundreds of ways to kneel and kiss the ground.
sentences.cn: 让我们热爱的美成为我们的所为.跪下来亲吻大地,有成百种方式.

sentences.en: Tom knelt down and patted the dog.
sentences.cn: 汤姆跪下来轻轻拍了拍那只狗。

sentences.en: What have you done, what have you done, that you should kneel to us!
sentences.cn: 你做过什么?你做过什么?为什么要向我们跪下?

trans.tran_en: to be in or move into a position where your body is resting on your knees
to be in or move into a position where your body is resting on your knees
